info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:23PM EDT until July 13 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Otsego County in central New York... Northwestern Broome County in central New York... Southeastern Cortland County in central New York... Northeastern Tioga County in central New York... Southern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near East Freetown to near Candor, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Norwich, Sidney, Guilford, Nanticoke, Coventry, Greene, Oxford, Berkshire, Bainbridge and Richford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
